title: My Pixel Phone hangs itself up after 2-5 seconds during a call
content:
I'll make a call, about half the time the phone I'm calling will ring, the other times my phone will hang up before a connection is made. But the phone will 100% of the time hang up within 2-5 seconds of being connected.

I've tried safe boot, SIM card reinsertion, turning off Enhanced 4G LTE mode, etc.
